text: Ali Shariatmadari (6 January 1924 â€“ 9 January 2017) was an Iranian academic and educationist. He was Minister of Culture in the interim government of Mehdi Bazargan in 1979. He was President of the Iranian Academy of Sciences from 1990 until 1998. He was also a Professor of Education at the Teacher Training University in Tehran and a member of High Council of the Cultural Revolution from 1982 until his death. Shariatmadari died in Shiraz, Iran on 9 January 2017, aged 93. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Iranian politicians Category:Iranian academics Category:People from Shiraz
title: Ali Shariatmadari
